name: SameerReddy13.github.io
body:
##About Me
Hey! My name is Sameer Reddy and I'm a second year undergraduate at UC Berkeley studying Computer Science. I love to learn and am most interested by computer science, statistics, math and the intersection of these fields. I've developed a few projects with what I've learned, so learn more about them below. 

##My Projects


####Hurt Alert
Hurt Alert was a web application developed as a team, built with Python and Flask. It utilizes Berkeley crime data to present analytics and visualize this data in a heat map. More importantly it uses this data to route from point A to point B; finding the safest route to avoid areas of higher crime rates. Check out the [application](http://hurtalert.us-west-1.elasticbeanstalk.com) and [repository](https://github.com/kunaljaydesai/hurtalert)

####Text Editor
A text editor application built in Java with all basic features of a common text editor. Check out the [repository](https://github.com/sameerreddy13/TextEditor).

####Bear Maps
A mapping application for Berkeley built in Java as part of a university course. Generates a map of Berkeley with map navigation and shortest path routing from any two locations on the map.

##Contact
[Github](https://github.com/sameerreddy13),
[Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/sameerreddy13),
[Email](sameer.reddy@berkeley.edu)
